#  BOT Sound Play
<!--
@name:  BOT Sound Play
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Plays the specified note of the specified instrument for the specified beats
## Parameters

- **type&dollar;**: The name of the instrument to use for playing, default to "piano"
- **note**: The frequency of the note to be played, from 0 (C-1 / Do 1) to 127 (G-9 / Sol 9)
- **note&dollar;**: The name of the note to play
- **beat**: The duration of the note, expressed in seconds
---
<p align="center"><img valign="middle" width="76px" src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/en/image001.png" /></p>
